preference.name: ChangeNoticeRevision_default_workflow_template
preference.preference_description: Defines the workflow that starts when a change notice revision is submitted. Valid Values: Any valid workflow type.

preference.name: SR5DocumentCNRevision_default_workflow_template
preference.preference_description: Defines the workflow that starts when a document change notice revision is submitted. Valid Values: Any valid workflow type.

preference.name: ChangeRequestRevision_default_workflow_template
preference.preference_description: Defines the workflow that starts when a change notice revision is submitted. Valid Values: Any valid workflow type.

preference.name: Epc0MfgCNRevision_default_workflow_template
preference.preference_description: Defines the workflow that starts when a change notice revision is submitted. Valid Values: Any valid workflow type.

preference.name: SR5_external_revision_respect_types
preference.preference_description: Defines the object types that are respected to increase their external revision.

preference.name: SR5_external_revision_respect_status
preference.preference_description: Defines the status which will be respected to increment a new ItemRevisions external revision.

preference.name: SR5_external_revision_exclude_chars
preference.preference_description: Characters to exclude in the external revision pattern.

preference.name: EPC_ManufacuringChangeNoticeType
preference.preference_description: Defines the internal type of Manufacturing Change Notice (MCN). Default value is "Epc0MfgCN"

preference.name: CM_change_derivations
preference.preference_description: Defines the type of change to create from a given source type during the Derive Change process. The format for valid values is "source_type/derived_type", where: source_type is the type of change from which to derive change, and derived_type is the type of change which will be created. This is a site preference only.
